text: Ptychosperma nicolai is a species of plant in the family Arecaceae, endemic to New Guinea. It grows up to 8 meters in height, with red fruit. == Synonyms == * Actinophloeus nicolai (Sander ex André) Burret * Romanovia nicolai Sander ex André == References == * Repert. Spec. Nov. Regni Veg. 24: 263 1928. * The Plant List * Encyclopedia of Life * e-Monocot * Palm Guide, Fairchild Tropical Botanic Garden nicolai Category:Endemic flora of New Guinea Category:Taxa named by Édouard André Category:Taxa named by Henry Frederick Conrad Sander Category:Taxa named by Max Burret
title: Ptychosperma nicolai
